repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a manscript of a lexicon which enlists words with variations in the forms. There are two different texts of the same title one is written by Puruṣottamadeva who is a grammarian and a lexicographer. This manuscript states that the author of the text is Śrīharṣa. The text consists of verses.

msItem.title: Dvirūpakośa
msItem.author: Śrīharṣa
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) prabodhamātraśabdikānāṃ kṛpāmā?paṃñcasatāṃ kavīnāṃ dvirūpakośo racito vicāryabahuprabanndha(śri?)taśabdabhedāt
msItem.explicit: (10v 5) śavālaṃ śaivālañcāpi śśaivālaśailasatayā śivālanceti rūpāṇi pañcadhā paricakṣate ityaṃ sat kavirājarājīmakuṭālaṃkārabhirādhitaṃ (śrīhirā?) bhavet (10v 6) naiṣadhamahāvye alaṃ kīrtitā .
msItem.finalRubric: (10v 6)ityukti prativādi san kṛta dīvityastavāmāṃghriṇāṃ śrīharṣeṇa kṛto dvirūpavilasat kośasatām śreyase ௳ (10v 7) iti dvirūpakośaḥ saṃpurṇam ௳

support.p: Palm leaf is used as support.The guard folio are slightly broken around the edges.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 10 written folio, 1 blank folio at the end.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin of the verso of the folio. First folio is without number. 2nd onwards Tamil numerals in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of Preservation. Some palces broken around the edges. A layer of the left margin of guard leaf is stripped off.

handNote.desc: Small characters. Ink is spread so shape of the letters is unclear many times.

additions.desc: Dvirūpakośa is written on the front guard folio with ink pen.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin of the front guard folio.
Numer 53 is written in pink chalk on the front guard folio.
hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on 1v.

binding.p: Red woolen thread is used to tie.

encodingDesc.p: Unclear letters or words are put in the bracket with questionmark. Spaces are added where necessory.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ ௳ prabodhamātraśabdikānāṃ kṛpāmā?paṃñcasatāṃ kavīnāṃ dvirūpakośo racito vicāryabahuprabanndha(śri?)taśabdabhedāt
(10v 5) śavālaṃ śaivālañcāpi śśaivālaśailasatayā śivālanceti rūpāṇi pañcadhā paricakṣate ityaṃ sat kavirājarājīmakuṭālaṃkārabhirādhitaṃ (śrīhirā?) bhavet (10v 6) naiṣadhamahāvye alaṃ kīrtitā . ityukti prativādi san kṛta dīvityastavāmāṃghriṇāṃ śrīharṣeṇa kṛto dvirūpavilasat kośasatām śreyase ௳ (10v 7) iti dvirūpakośaḥ saṃpurṇam ௳
